title: Player's items bought should be disabled
body: I think information about each player's bought items should be disabled so that players can equip their best secret items without being easily seen by their enemy. This will make the game more fun, more thinking and creation. Is it more interesting if I start the game like a Tank and equip into an ADC or Assassin minutes later without being revealed ? I think you'll be surprised !

replies.body: This would literally (and I use that word sparingly,) break the game.
